name: Magic system V1
desc: A first version magic system consisting of Fire, Electric using hands or wands. Animations, SFX and FX all included.

name: Save system meta data
desc: Any saves will now contain metadata such as the date of save, level and character name.

name: Main menu controller
desc: Main menu can now be used fully with controller.

name: Quater 2 Test
desc: Main menu can now be used fully with controller.

name: Quater 1 Test
desc: Main menu can now be used fully with controller.

name: Combat animation overhaul
desc: Improving all animations across melee combat to make it far better.

name: 2.0.0 release
desc: Inventory version 2.0.0 major release.

name: Loot Tables
desc: Loot tables added for better item management.

name: Data Asset for Narrative Item Collections
desc: Added DataAsset to bundle items.

name: Soft References for Items
desc: Soft references now used for items.

name: Give Default Items Function
desc: New function to give default items.

name: Equip and Unequip Montages
desc: Added equip/unequip montages.

name: Loot Source on End Looting
desc: Added loot source on end looting.

name: Gameplay Tags for Narrative Items
desc: Added gameplay tags to items.

name: Item Stats Struct
desc: Updated ItemStats to a struct.

name: Description Override in Blueprints
desc: Blueprints can now override description.

name: Auto-Use Item
desc: Added bool to auto-use items.

name: Set Inventory Name Function
desc: New function to set inventory name.

name: Throwable Weapon Slot
desc: Added throwable weapon slot.

name: Use Sound for Narrative Items
desc: Added sound when items are used.

name: Vendor Inventory Merge
desc: Merged vendor and regular inventories.

name: BPC_HasItem Soft Classes
desc: Updated BPC_HasItem to use soft classes.

name: Interactable_Loot_Locked Soft References
desc: Updated Interactable_Loot_Locked soft references.

name: Interactable_Loot Soft References
desc: Updated Interactable_Loot soft references.

name: Redirector Fixes
desc: Fixed several redirectors.

name: Vendor Equippable Items Fix
desc: Vendors won't show equipped items.

name: Inventory Save Fail
desc: Inventory now returns false if save fails.

name: Hotbar Delay Note
desc: Hotbar delayed; not ready yet.

name: Layered map tiles
desc: Levels can now contain multiple map tiles.

name: Controller fixes
desc: More fixes for controllers in world map.

name: Equipment Cloth Physics
desc: Cloth Physics will now show in the inventory screen.

name: Hotbar
desc: Inventory hotbar for quick switching equipment / items.

name: Remove single item function
desc: A function to remove a single item with a quantity.

name: All interactions will be checked
desc: When finding an interaction, every interaction will be checked rather than skipping at the first one.
